title: Anyone else have a problem connecting to League Chat?
body: What's happening...this is getting on my nerves

replies.body: I keep getting the "logging onto chat service" bug. Tryed the set date to one day ahead, didn't work. RIP in peace Gold.

I also run into this problem fairly consistently. Log in, have to hit reconnect to chat 3 times or so, and most of the time be fine. However, there are times when I connect to chat, go to que up, right before the que pops, I get disconnected from chat again, so I have to decline the game and wait for the client to let me reconnect to chat again. Getting fairly annoying.

Hey Goldenboy,

These problems can be hard to tackle, I recommend you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that our techs can help you out.
it rarely happens but i have a friend we would be on skype while the games chat ain't working for him though i only got it once to be fair
